title: AFL: I'd like to see that [advertisement] 1996
brief_description: Produced in 1996 to commemorate the Centenary of Australian Rules Football this ad features international celebrities John Lee Hooker (musician), Heather Locklear (actress), Archbishop Desmond Tutu (religious leader) and George Burns (comedian). Produced by Campaign Palace.
